EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Confirmation - New York (PM)
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed for Data Science Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there,}}
You are now registered for the Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop in New York.
Date & Location Thursday, October 20th, 2016 1:30PM to 5:30PM
Pivotal New York 625 Avenue of the Americas Second Floor, New York, NY 10011
New York Agenda 1:00PM-1:30PM Registration & Lunch 1:30PM-5:30PM Hands on Data Science Technical Workshop
Prepare your system for the workshop If you are planning to follow the workshop labs, you will need to have a client ssh program installed.
There are several open source / free programs available:
- Windows: Putty http://www.putty.org/ <[[http://www.putty.org/]]> or MobaXterm http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html <[[http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html]]> (MobaXterm is preferred) - MacOS: Native built in - Linux: Native built in
You are also welcome to use any commercial version of ssh if you have it.
Questions? If you have a question about the workshop, please contact us at events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you at the workshop.
Best Regards, Pivotal Data Science Team
